column3: “Diggity Diggity DANK! This strain has climbed to my #1 favorite strain of all time instantly. I picked this up from Good Meds Lakewood and I'm telling you that those growers know what they're doing. This is a stone I will remember for a long time. heady, heavy, relaxing, and very euphoric all at the same time. what a dank smoke. pick this up if you ever come across it, it's some fire.”

“Like everyone says, it tastes amazing!  Prior to vaping (thanks UGD!!!🙏😊), I was in a lot of pain & had anxiety all day.  After 4 or 5 puffs...life is good!  Only half dumb, nearly pain free (8/10 reduced to 4/10), anxiety free & melted into my heavenly seat.  A creeper & a keeper!!!!”

“Connoisseur genetics delivers again! I really love this strain because it's really one of the most indica indica strains I've tried. Effects were a intense body high that left me feeling sleepy and happy. Smell was on point, a very pungent cheese scent. Buds were quite unique looking, dense and a very dark purple green. Highly recommend!
Connoisseur”

“One of the best tasting strains I've ever smoked. Rich wine and cheese flavor comes through on every last hit. The high itself is great for stress and pain relief as well as loss of appetite. The Herbal Cure is where I always grab it. Outstanding.”
“Really like the look and taste of these buds !..a nice n quick sedation and relaxation kicked in..ready to get some rest now”
“Perfect strain if you're planning on sitting back all day and watching tv”

“I decided to try this after I saw it on my dispensary's site. I'm so happy I picked this up. Loved it from the first hit to the last. Nice taste of purp with cheese. Good to help you relax and sleep. One of my new faves :-)”
“Perfrct indica. This strain will leave you happy, euphoric, and very heavily sedated. It is the perfect smoke after a long day or if youre feeling anxious.”
“Purple cheddar is one of my favorites. Very tasty and gives a peaceful, happy feeling making it pleasant to do whatever is on your agenda that day.”

“I decided to try this after I saw it on my dispensary's site. I'm so happy I picked this up. Loved it from the first hit to the last. Nice taste of purp with cheese. Good to help you relax and sleep. One of my new faves :-)”

“Powerful.  After vape session I started having vertigo, which is one of my MS symptions.  I don't use sleep meds, because they often do this too.  Next time I will only use about 3 hits of this strain on the vaporizer.  Good strain for folks who want to get an old fashioned shit faced high.  At my age, I prefer to be a bit more functional.”
“Perfrct indica. This strain will leave you happy, euphoric, and very heavily sedated. It is the perfect smoke after a long day or if youre feeling anxious.”

“My friend has been through many strains and has quite a refined weed pallet. I trust him and so should you. So when he says it’s one of the best indica’s he’s ever had you best know it’s true.  Don’t miss out people.”
“seriously one of my favorite concentrates!”

“I would rate this strain of 4.5 or a five star I only smoked one bowl out of it and it put me on my ass. I was relaxed and all my pain in my back was gone. Definitely something to try if you have chronic pain.(Down Side) cotton mouth, munchies other then that one of the best strains I have had and I would definitely recommend.”
“Just bought this wonder strain for the first time this weekend and have to say love the taste and the non gluedness even though it's a indicia. killed my pain but kept me active and functing”

“odor strong enough
to displace any deuce bomb trail left by your constipated grandpa”

“I'm really jealous of you guys! I chose PC based on reviews, and what I got looked beautiful. But where it counts, it's taste and potency were disappointing. Not bad, but not special and not very potent. Oh well!”

“I absolutely dig so much about this strain. The smell is delightful, the taste is deliciously cheesy with a hint of sweet, and a little of it went a hell of a long way. I felt so relaxed that I swear I time traveled, and it made dinner magical. I strongly recommend this one if you want a nice evening... emphasis on nice.”
“Creative and tasty.”
“Love the taste & smells delicious :) mellow happy high”
“FUCKING AMAZING. THE TASTE IS THE BEST PART GOOD HIGH I LOVE THIS STRIAN MOSTLY FOR THE TASTE BUMP SOME  Reggae and blaze this STRIAN YUM YUM”
“Very pungent cheesy smell, flows threw the body and mind with a nice and calm wavy feeling. Nice and smooth taste with a hint of cheese.”
“dank”
